title: Mirihana milk powder queue still remains
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A long queue was seen at the Local Milk Powder outlet in Mirihana, Nugegoda this morning, as the shortage remains unresolved.
Moreover, the Government has also not presented a solution for the fuel, gas and food shortages in the country.
As a result, people are still seen waiting in long queues to obtain essentials such as Kerosene Oil and Milk Powder, among other essentials.
